quote: International Agreement Information means information the Department of Homeland Security receives that is required to be protected by an information sharing agreement or arrangement with a foreign government...

quote: Homeland Security Enforcement Information means unclassified information of a sensitive nature... the unauthorized disclosure of which could adversely impact the mission of the Department;

label: Security (Personnel & Facility)
quote: Information Systems Vulnerability Information (ISVI) means: ... Information pertaining to national security systems and eligible for classification under Executive Order 13526 will be classified as appropriate; and/or ... the release of which could hinder the objectives of the Department, compromise a technological advantage or countermeasure, cause a denial of service, or provide an adversary with sufficient information to clone, counterfeit, or circumvent a process or system;
